name: Reclaim Your Domain: The UMW Hackathon
body:
## The 2nd Annual Reclaim Your Domain Hackathon ### November 22nd and 23rd, 2014 Pepperdine West LA Campus

A group of committed educators and programmers will be convening in Fredericksburg, VA for a hackathon to extend and develop the ideas around "Reclaim Your Domain". Specific focus will be on hacking an infrastructure for syndicating, securing and managing third-part service data, as well as working together to clearly articulate the rationale and vision for this work.

These efforts build on an array of ongoing initiatives, as well as this summer's hackathon in Los Angeles and last year's hackathon at MIT, where Reclaim Your Domain was conceived.

The event will bring together people who have made impressive progress in these areas, though there is still a great deal of thinking, sharing, and creating to be done.

Tentative Agenda

(To be elaborated by participants as the event approaches.)

Friday, November 21st:

  • Evening reception. Location TBD

Saturday, November 22nd:

UMW's Fredericksburg Campus

  • 9:00 - 10:00 – Introductions
  • 10:00 - 11:00 — Demonstrations of existing work
  • 11:00 - 12:00 — Definition of goals and scope
  • 1:00 - 2:00 — Check in, role definition, breakout groups
  • 2:00 – 4:00 — Hackathon!
  • 4:00 - 5:00 -- Review and Day Two agenda setting

Sunday, November 23nd:

UMW's Fredericksburg Campus

  • 9:00 – 12:00 Working brunch
  • 12:00 – 5:00 Hackathon continues

If you have any questions about the event, please contact Jim Groom and Kin Lane.

Housing for the event will be at Fredericskburg's Hyatt Place - 1241 Jefferson Davis Highway Fredericksburg, Virginia, 22401.
